title: Promos
body:
So, I’m trying to get myself out of Bronze. I’ve been bronze 4 for the longest time and I finally got into promos. I had one free win from the last time I was in promos (a long time ago lol) and I won another game which meant I had the majority (2 wins 0 losses). When I went to see that I was in Bronze 5, my screen said “Congratualtions, you’ve been promoted to Bronze 3!” How does that even make sense when I never lost my promos?? Why am I in Bronze 3 when I should be in Bronze 5?? This is extremely annoying since now I’m even further from silver.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
!><

I love this post so much, thank you for reaching out to us.  The divisions rank from 5 as the lowest and 1 as the highest.  You want to climb from 5 to 1, which will then give you a chance into Silver.  Our [ranked play FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)should have more info as well.   Let me know if that clears things up!

Oh my goodness.... I’ve been thinking of it the other way around this whole time! I feel so stupid lmao. Thank you so much for clearing things up!
Edit: I’m going to keep this post up (even though it makes me look stupid) for people with the same question!
It does NOT make you look stupid, it's an easy mistake and I'm sure other competitive ladders outside of League would work like that.  Glad I could help!
